text: <@U07TDNTPN48> I'm not seeing the option to convert to Hubl.

<@UJAPS2K4N> the plan is to definitely redesign the site but I am trying to do so incrementally since it's a big task. The first step was to add the old header/footer to a newer drag and drop template so I can start updating some of the pages, and eventually I can just swap with new header/footer. I just have this mega menu that is not working. I styled the dropdowns better and maybe that's good enough for now, we shall see.
Hi everyone. How to fix external dependency error in HubSpot?

I have a question. In HubSpot, there is an option called "case study." How is it used? Also, if we publish case studies as blog posts, can we display the first 3 case studies on a webpage? Can we make it similar to an RSS listing for blogs?
